results.title: Secret Service Admits Not Searching Golf Course Perimeter, Drawing New Scrutiny

results.title: Looking for a New Way to See Iceland? Bring Your Knitting Needles.
results.abstract: In a country with more sheep than people, a D.I.Y. wool journey — from sheep farms to yarn shops — makes perfect sense. Our writer brushes up on her knitting on a driving trip from Reykjavik.
